overview:
Under Sampson A. Brown’s direction, Knight & Carver Wind Group has become a world-wide industry leader, specializing in the service and repair of wind blades for the fast-growing company.

In recent years, Mr. Brown has directed an expansion of the Wind Group with a full-scale blade production facility in South Dakota, along with increasing the workforce to more than 200 employees. In 2007, the company secured a $12.5 million investment by Global Environment Fund, a leading private equity firm.

Now, as the U.S. recognizes the compelling need to produce more renewable energy, Knight & Carver Wind Group stands poised for continued growth and prosperity, hallmarks of Mr. Brown’s vision for the company.
